page.title: 19PLACES OF WORSHIP S.REIGATE
page.content: In the Earlswood area is the most outstanding church in the block,St. John's Church of England.St.Francis Church serves the needs of the Deaf and Dumb.Tolgate Evangelical Church is the Free Church in this area. Moslems have also established a centre for worship. The only Church in the Meadvale area is the Methodist Church in Lower Road. There are five churches in the east of the block:a Roman Catholic Chapel of Rest,Reigate Park United Re_ formed Church and two Anglican church_ es,St.Luke's and St.Peter's.The insti_ tution and induction of the Rev.Alan Mayer to the Parish of St.Luke with St.Peter is planned for Thursday 19th. December 1985 at 8pm.
